snippet: A tasting of some 2012 bottlings from East End vintners showed treats of pink, red and salmon-colored rosés.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews rose wines from East End vintners (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: A tasting of some 2012 bottlings from East End vintners showed treats of pink, red and salmon-colored rosés.

headline.print_headline: A Season for Rosé And the Outdoors
